Monologue.Current: “ЭЙ!”
Monologue.Original: “HEY!”

Monologue.Current: “You can’t leave here wearing your uniform!{Line} You need permission!”
Monologue.Original: “You can’t leave here wearing your uniform!{Line} You need permission!”

Monologue.Current: “Didn’t you hear the announcement!?{Line} SeeD candidates are to assemble{Line} in front of the {Color Blue}〖2F classroom〗{Color White}!”
Monologue.Original: “Didn’t you hear the announcement!?{Line} SeeD candidates are to assemble{Line} in front of the {Color Blue}〖2F classroom〗{Color White}!”

Monologue.Current: “You’re not allowed to go out after curfew!”
Monologue.Original: “You’re not allowed to go out after curfew!”

Monologue.Current: “How many times do I have to tell you!?{Line} Because of your lack of understanding,{Line} I’m going to have to report you{Line} to your instructor!”
Monologue.Original: “How many times do I have to tell you!?{Line} Because of your lack of understanding,{Line} I’m going to have to report you{Line} to your instructor!”

Monologue.Current: Your SeeD rank went down...
Monologue.Original: Your SeeD rank went down...

Monologue.Current: “Hey, {Char Squall}. The Garden is in chaos.{Line} The monsters from the training center{Line} are everywhere. The members of the{Line} Garden Master’s faction set them free.”{Next}“Watch your back, man.”
Monologue.Original: “Hey, {Char Squall}. The Garden is in chaos.{Line} The monsters from the training center{Line} are everywhere. The members of the{Line} Garden Master’s faction set them free.”{Next}“Watch your back, man.”

Monologue.Current: “If you’re going inside,{Line} take this.”
Monologue.Original: “If you’re going inside,{Line} take this.”

Monologue.Current: Received [Mega Potion]!
Monologue.Original: Received [Mega Potion]!

Monologue.Current: “Can’t go out under these circumstances.{Line} Stay indoors, why don’t you.”
Monologue.Original: “Can’t go out under these circumstances.{Line} Stay indoors, why don’t you.”

Monologue.Current: “Я здесь ещё с момента{Line} основания сада...”
Monologue.Original: “I’ve been here since{Line} the Garden was established.”

Monologue.Current: “For a moment there,{Line} I was quite worried.”
Monologue.Original: “For a moment there,{Line} I was quite worried.”

Monologue.Current: “Каждый год в эти стены входят{Line} новые негодники. Полные энергии,{Line} радости!.. Ох, как же я люблю их ругать!..”
Monologue.Original: “Every single year, you get trouble makers{Line} entering. Oh, how I enjoy scolding them...!”

Monologue.Current: “Что-что? Ты мне бросаешь вызов?”{Line}Да{Line}Нет, что вы!
Monologue.Original: “Huh!? You’re challenging moi?”{Line}Yes{Line}No

Monologue.Current: “Oh, I see... You know rules{Line} that don’t exist here.”{Next}“Alright then! Let’s mix in{Line} {Term Balamb}’s rules!”
